title: Unfairly banned
body: So my internet disconnected and i had to restart to get back into the game. Afterwards i was informed that i had been placed in lower priority queue and have to wait 20 minutes to get into queue every game for 5 games. Anyone know how to get a hold of someone to fix this. Pretty annoying how i have no say in when this happens and im not really wanting to play anymore because of it

replies.body: It shouldn't ban you if it only happens once. And if it is happening multiple times, then you should take action to fix it. It's rude to constantly leave your allies a member short.
